Articles.Content:
I am going to start a Career Mode Mission Report here. As the name may suggest, I have both DLC and 'a few' mods:

Spoiler

Put as spoiler because I have like 30 of them:

Ablative-Airbrake (AblativeAirbrake 1.0.3)
B9 Aerospace Procedural Wings - Fork (B9-PWings-Fork 3:0.43.0.10)
BetterTimeWarpContinued (BetterTimeWarpCont 2.3.12.9)
Breaking Ground (BreakingGround-DLC 1.7.1)
ClickThrough Blocker (ClickThroughBlocker 1:0.1.10.17)
Community Delta-V Maps (CommunityDeltaVMaps 2:2.8)
Community Tech Tree (CommunityTechTree 1:3.4.4)
Environmental Visual Enhancements Redux (EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements 3:1.11.6.1)
Hangar Extender (HangerExtenderExtended 3.6.0.2)
Kerbal Engineer Redux (KerbalEngineerRedux 1.1.9.0)
KerbalX Mod (KerbalXMod 1.1.0)
Kronal Vessel Viewer Continued (KVVContinued 0.1.1)
KSP Recall (KSP-Recall v0.2.1.3)
KXAPI (KXAPI 1.2.0)
Making History (MakingHistory-DLC 1.12.1)
MechJeb 2 (MechJeb2 2.12.3.0)
Module Manager (ModuleManager 4.2.1)
Patch Manager (PatchManager 0.0.17.3)
Precise Node (PreciseNode 1.2.11.2)
Procedural Parts (ProceduralParts v2.3.0)
Procedural Parts - Hazard Tanks Textures (HazardTanksTextures 1.0)
Procedural Parts - Ven's Revamp Style Textures (VensStylePPTextures 1.1)
ReStock (ReStock 1.4.2)
ReStock+ (ReStockPlus 1.4.2)
scatterer (Scatterer 3:v0.0825b)
Scatterer Default Config (Scatterer-config 3:v0.0825b)
Scatterer Sunflare (Scatterer-sunflare 3:v0.0825b)
TextureReplacer (TextureReplacer v4.5.2)
Textures Unlimited (TexturesUnlimited 1.5.10.25)
Toolbar Controller (ToolbarController 1:0.1.9.6)
TweakScale - Rescale Everything! (TweakScale v2.4.6.8)
Waterfall - Restock (WaterfallRestock 0.2.3)
Waterfall Core (Waterfall 0.8.1)
Zero MiniAVC (ZeroMiniAVC 1:1.1.2.4)
 

Also, if you see a box as the last letter of the title, that last letter is an interrobang (combined exclamation point and question mark).

 

*edit*

I'm playing on 1.12.3.(whatever)

Edited January 30, 2022 by 4D4850
Added more clarifying info
Teaser: I killed Jeb on the second launch

The PURPLE program

 

(I will add images someday. Today is not that day)

 

The KSC originally started as a soup manufacturer. However, after several fires, they realized that their stock also worked as rocket fuel. For PURPLE 1,  they used dried veggie stock as solid fuel. While it went up, the KSC realized something else was needed to go beyond. They decided to use beef stock as a liquid fuel. This worked, although unfortunately Jebediah died during reentry. After figuring out that insulation is a thing, they slapped some of it on the bottom of the Mk. 1 Command Pod, and Valentina managed to reach orbit and get back. After a brief interlude where Bob flew a horrible affront to nature, Val managed to both fulfill a testing contract and flyby the Mun.

Spoiler

Story Fragment:

He who sleeps shall wake again

 

 

Edited January 31, 2022 by 4D4850
added story fragment

I am now working on the GREEN program, but my parents have a screen time limit and I've just run out, so sending this from my tablet. Also, because of [current event], I'm going to miss school, so more time for KSP. I hope GREEN goes well. Also, if you're curious, I'm choosing the order of colors based on This list of colors

Edited January 30, 2022 by 4D4850
Fixed link
I have added the Trajectories Mod!
I got about 1500 science from Minmus. Wow.
I have added craft manager from CKAN, as I expect a lot of crafts will be made.
Also, I needed to remove tweakscale and KerbalX, as they both caused some problems.
